overview_of_class:
Experimental techniques of modern organic chemistry emphasizing chemical separations, spectroscopic characterization, and reactions such as amide synthesis, Grignard reaction, aldol condensation, Robinson annulation, and Diels-Alder reaction.

Chemistry 230-3 is the laboratory course associated with Chemistry 210-3.
name: Organic Chemistry Lab II
title: WCAS CHEM 230-3-01 Organic Chemistry Lab II
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 210-3 01 at 9AM.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Experimental techniques of modern organic chemistry emphasizing chemical separations, spectroscopic characterization, and reactions such as amide synthesis, Grignard reaction, aldol condensation, Robinson annulation, and Diels-Alder reaction.

Chemistry 230-3 is the laboratory course associated with Chemistry 210-3.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisite: Student must earn a grade of C- or better in Chemistry 210-2 and Chemistry 230-2.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. Turning Technologies Model QT or NXT "Clicker" and associated license ($58.65 new; $44.00 used)***
2. 100% Cotton Laboratory Coat ($45)
3. Approved Laboratory Goggles or Safety Glasses ($10)

Items 2 and 3 will be sold during the first week of classes; sales details TBA

***Prices as listed at Northwestern Norris Bookstore on 2/3/17. Materials may be available from other vendors at lower prices.
